name: Turses
body:
### turses

A Twitter client for the console.

![screenshot]

 [screenshot]: http://dialelo.com/img/turses_buffers.png

### Installation

#### From source

```
$ git clone https://alejandrogomez@github.com/alejandrogomez/turses.git
$ cd turses
$ python setup.py install
```

#### Python Package Index (PyPI)

```
$ pip install turses
```

or

```
$ easy_install turses
```

#### AUR

A package in the [Arch User Repository (AUR)](http://aur.archlinux.org) is available for Arch Linux users. You can install it with ``yaourt``.

```
yaourt -S turses
```
tagline: Twitter client written in Python featuring a sexy curses interface.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
